meanings.sent1: The store had some unadvertised discounts that were not shown in the flyers.
meanings.sent2: The unadvertised event turned out to be a pleasant surprise for everyone.
meanings.sent3: She found an unadvertised shortcut through the park that saved her time.
meanings.sent4: The unadvertised treasure hidden in the attic was a delightful discovery.
meanings.sent5: The unadvertised job opportunity came at just the right moment for him.

meanings.definition: Not promoted or marketed through advertising
meanings.sent1: The unadvertised product was a hidden gem that only a few knew about.
meanings.sent2: They decided to go with the unadvertised brand because of its quality.
meanings.sent3: The unadvertised restaurant down the street became their favorite spot.
meanings.sent4: Her unadvertised talent for painting surprised everyone at the art show.
meanings.sent5: The unadvertised service provided exceptional value for its customers.
